data.name: Fireshark Epic Rockets
data.detailed_description: Fireshark Epic Rockets - enjoy a real firework show with this classic holiday carton of 12 multi-effect rockets! Loud bangs and impressive burst effects are sure to light up the Christmas sky and make your fishing holiday even more festive! Crack ‘em up on your own or send as a gift to your friend!
data.about_the_game: Fireshark Epic Rockets - enjoy a real firework show with this classic holiday carton of 12 multi-effect rockets! Loud bangs and impressive burst effects are sure to light up the Christmas sky and make your fishing holiday even more festive! Crack ‘em up on your own or send as a gift to your friend!
data.short_description: Fireshark Epic Rockets - enjoy a real firework show with this classic holiday carton of 12 multi-effect rockets! Loud bangs and impressive burst effects are sure to light up the Christmas sky and make your fishing holiday even more festive! Crack ‘em up on your own or send as a gift to your friend!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
